siteMetadata.title: Lucas Oliveira's Blog
siteMetadata.description: This is my coding blog where I write about what I do and study

nodes.excerpt: I've started to play with Spring Batch and ETLs and this is what I've got (so far)…. The year of 2019 has been very intense for me because I've had the opportunity to learn a lot about Web development using Java Spring and DevOps culture in general…

frontmatter.title: Using Spring Batch to create an ETL for financial information
